channel.title: Java it self help
channel.description:
Hi my computer went all werid and now 'java' is not recognized"
the error is
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
What do i do i never had tihis thing befor

item.title: Java it self help
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Okay so your code in compiler should be :

@echo off COLOR 08 title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin/java.exe" server pause

And the code in runserver.bat should be:

@echo off @color 1f title Server compiler echo Starting "YOURSERVERNAMEHERE" "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" server pause

You may notice its switched around a bit… but it should work.
Hope That Helps!

Read full topic

item.title: Java it self help
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

I help alot of random people with this error and others leading to the same problem.
Okay, first, what JDK download do you have installed to your PC? From there, I will format a code for you to put in your Compile.bat and Runserver.bat files.

Read full topic
